items.title: Research, Development & Learning (RDL)
items.text: Each individual's RDL programme is unique and designed in collaboration with your line manager. You might spend this time doing formal certification, contributing to open source software or evaluating a new technology or mastering a framework you already know.

items.title: Bonus Scheme
items.text: There is a 10% annual bonus scheme, of which 5% is based on personal performance and 5% on company profitability.

items.title: Pension Scheme
items.text: Digirati will match your personal contribution to your pension by up to 5%.

items.title: Sabbatical
items.text: Employees are entitled to a 4 week sabbatical after 5 years with the company which can be amalgamated with annual leave to provide an opportunity to take time out.

items.title: Referral Programme
items.text: Employees will receive a Â£500 bonus if they refer a fellow employee who successfully completes their probation period.

items.title: Working from Home
items.text: Employees will likely spend the majority of their time in the office but there is some scope for working from home at managerial discretion.

items.title: Flexitime
items.text: Client schedules permitting we can be flexible when employees start and end work.
